title: Steamed Salted Fish in Black Bean Sauce
ingredients: ['3 1/2 tablespoons cooking oil', '100g salted fermented black beans', '2 teaspoons rice wine', '1/4 teaspoon monosodium glutamate (MSG)', '400g dried salted fish fillet, washed and cut into slices', '1 spring onion, cut into 2cm lengths', '1 (2.5cm) piece fresh ginger, thinly sliced', '5 dried red chillies, cut into quarters']
